author: Deleted User
content: Hello all, I would like to know more about composable NFTs and I saw these two EIPs 998 & 6220 been reviewed, is there anything else i can refer to? and is it yet to be recognized or what is status of the Composable NFT (to which standard it belongs to)

author: abcoathup
content: This Discord is for Ethereum R&D.  For ERCs (application layer) I suggest contacting the ERC authors directly for more information.  ERC998 is draft, ERC6220 is review and ERC4883 (composable SVG NFT) is draft (I am one of the authors, you can Twitter DM me).
